column4: i'm a bit confused: i removed gnome-screensaver with the help of Synaptic, then later it occurred to me that there might be some pkgs which depend on it, so i asked apt-cache for rdepends, and got some. So i thought that Synaptic should've either removed them, or warned me. I also tried a "apt-get -f install" which replies "0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded". So it looks like apt-cache is mistaken, right?
oh yeah i meant to say i replaced it with xscreensaver
perhaps the packages that depend on it aren't installed?
they are, i made sure to ask apt-cache --installed
